directions: Blend ice cubes, vodka, 2 ounces lemon sorbet, simple syrup, lemon juice, and mint together in a blender until smooth; pour into a chilled cocktail glass. Pour hard lemonade over vodka mixture and float remaining 1 ounce lemon sorbet on top.
ingredients: 4 fluid ounces hard lemonade (such as Mike's Hard Lemonade®)
title: Frozen Lemon Sorbet Martini
